**Acceptance Criteria**  
This issue can be closed when the abstract has been updated and the Merge Request has been approved.

**Tasks**
- [ ] Create New Branch
- [ ] Make Adjustments to Abstract
- [ ] Create Merge Request
- [ ] Close Issue
